pageContext.claim: “We need people at 3.7 percent unemployment, but they have to be brought in the legal way. And they have to be -- we talk merit. We want to bring them in through merit. We want people that can love our country and people that can help our country.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump favors merit-based immigration, but under current U.S. law, immigrants may apply for asylum no matter how they got into the country, as long as they are inside.
